https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oTnGWcM5LizDTGsV9Z3pVGcpyP.jpg Ah, to see ourselves as others see us. Michael's mid-life crisis was a flame out. Left his wife. Bought a Porsche (used). Now, lonely and looking to make amends, he's seeking forgiveness and counsel from his angry daughter. Laurie sees right though him. Clown Face
